entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
